subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Maritime Accidents and Safety
Volvo Ocean Race
lead_paragraph: Since an inquiry into a crash that stranded members of Team Vestas Wind, small changes have been made to the rules in the Volvo Ocean Race, and officials have said there would be more.
snippet: Since an inquiry into a crash that stranded members of Team Vestas Wind, small changes have been made to the rules in the Volvo Ocean Race, and officials have said there would be more.
